ingredients: 1 (1 ounce) envelope dry onion soup mix
instructions: Preheat the oven to 250 degrees F (120 degrees C).

Melt the butter in a saucepan over medium heat. Stir in the Worcestershire sauce, garlic powder, onion soup mix and hot pepper sauce. Coat pretzels in the mixture by dipping or brushing and place on a baking sheet.
Bake for 1 hour in the preheated oven, stirring every 15 minutes. Cool, then serve or store in an airtight container.
title: Bar Stool Pretzels
sentences: Preheat the oven to 250 degrees F (120 degrees C).
Melt the butter in a saucepan over medium heat.
Stir in the Worcestershire sauce, garlic powder, onion soup mix and hot pepper sauce.
Coat pretzels in the mixture by dipping or brushing and place on a baking sheet.
Bake for 1 hour in the preheated oven, stirring every 15 minutes.
Cool, then serve or store in an airtight container.
